name: Soccer Ball
description: High-quality soccer ball for professional play.
detailedDescription: This soccer ball is made from premium materials and designed for excellent performance on the field. It features a durable outer layer and a responsive bladder for consistent play.

name: Basketball Hoop
description: Indoor basketball hoop for home use.
detailedDescription: Bring the game of basketball into your home with this easy-to-install indoor basketball hoop. It comes with a sturdy backboard, a breakaway rim, and a basketball for immediate play.

name: Tennis Racket
detailedDescription: Ideal for beginners and casual players, this tennis racket combines lightweight construction with a comfortable grip. It's designed to help improve your game without sacrificing control.

name: Running Shoes
description: Premium running shoes for all-terrain use.
detailedDescription: These running shoes are engineered for comfort and performance on all types of terrain. They feature a lightweight design, responsive cushioning, and a breathable upper for maximum airflow.

name: Baseball Bat
detailedDescription: Crafted from solid wood, this baseball bat offers durability and performance. It's ideal for players of all ages and skill levels, providing a comfortable grip and powerful swing.

name: Swimming Goggles
description: Anti-fog swimming goggles for competitive swimmers.
detailedDescription: These swimming goggles are designed to enhance your underwater visibility with their anti-fog lenses. They provide a comfortable fit and a secure seal, making them perfect for competitive swimmers.

name: Golf Clubs Set
description: Complete set of golf clubs for intermediate players.
detailedDescription: This golf clubs set includes everything you need to hit the course with confidence. It features a driver, irons, wedges, and a putter, all designed for performance and forgiveness.

name: Boxing Gloves
description: Premium leather boxing gloves for training and sparring.
detailedDescription: These boxing gloves are made from high-quality leather, offering durability and comfort during training and sparring sessions. They feature padding for protection and wrist support for stability.

name: Cycling Helmet
description: Lightweight cycling helmet for road and mountain biking.
detailedDescription: Protect your head with this lightweight cycling helmet, designed for both road and mountain biking. It features ventilation for airflow, adjustable straps for a secure fit, and a visor to shield your eyes from the sun.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat for practicing yoga at home or in the studio.
detailedDescription: This yoga mat provides a stable and comfortable surface for your yoga practice. It's made from non-slip material to prevent slipping and sliding during poses. Lightweight and easy to carry.

name: Hiking Backpack
description: Waterproof hiking backpack with multiple compartments.
detailedDescription: Take on the trails with this waterproof hiking backpack. It offers ample storage space with multiple compartments for organizing your gear. Features padded straps and a breathable back panel for comfort.

name: Snowboard
description: Freestyle snowboard for riders who enjoy park and pipe.
detailedDescription: This freestyle snowboard is perfect for riders who love hitting the park and pipe. It features a twin tip design for switch riding, camber underfoot for stability, and rocker at the tips for float in powder.

name: Surfboard
detailedDescription: Catch waves with ease on this performance surfboard designed for experienced surfers. It features a sleek design for speed and maneuverability in the water, offering control and responsiveness.

name: Cricket Bat
description: Handcrafted cricket bat for serious cricketers.
detailedDescription: Handcrafted from premium willow, this cricket bat is made for serious cricketers. It offers excellent balance and power, allowing batsmen to play their shots with confidence and precision.

name: Weightlifting Barbell
detailedDescription: Train like a champion with this Olympic-grade weightlifting barbell. It's crafted for durability and performance, featuring a knurled grip for a secure hold and precision-engineered sleeves for smooth rotation.

name: Skateboard
description: Complete skateboard for street and park skating.
detailedDescription: Get rolling with this complete skateboard, perfect for street and park skating. It features a sturdy deck, smooth-rolling wheels, and responsive trucks for tricks and cruising.

name: Trekking Poles
description: Adjustable trekking poles for hiking and backpacking.
detailedDescription: Enhance your hiking experience with these adjustable trekking poles. They provide stability on uneven terrain, reduce strain on your joints, and feature ergonomic grips for comfort.

name: Gymnastics Mat
description: Foldable gymnastics mat for home practice.
detailedDescription: Practice gymnastics at home with this foldable mat. It offers cushioning and support for tumbling, stretching, and floor exercises. Easy to store and transport.
